data.title: British Comedy Guide
meta_keywords: Martin Clunes British comedy work Actor
data.meta_description: Martin Clunes OBE is an English actor who first achieved national success in the 1980s BBC television sitcom No Place Like Home. He is best known for his starring roles in 1990s sitcom Men Behaving Badly and 2000s comedy drama Doc Martin, and is a popular face on British television.
